    • org.colomoto.mddlib.logicalfunction.operators.AbstractOperator

    public abstract class AbstractOperator
extends Object
implements FunctionNode
    Common methods for internal nodes (operators).

    Fabrice Lopez: initial implementation, Aurelien Naldi: adaptation
